mapper.insert: insert into t_member(referrer, receiver, is_order_store, login_name, real_name, card_id, account_bank, bank_card_code, bank_province, bank_city, phone, detail_addres, is_check_cash, store_name, store_agent_address, email, remit_account, remit_account_bank, remit_datetime, remit_peple, remit_money) values (#{referrer},#{receiver},#{is_order_store},#{login_name},#{real_name}, #{card_id},#{account_bank},#{bank_card_code},#{bank_province},#{bank_city}, #{phone},#{detail_addres},0,#{store_name},#{store_agent_address}, #{email},#{remit_account},#{remit_account_bank},#{remit_datetime},#{remit_peple}, #{remit_money})
